document_api_meta.title: Update Global Inventory
document_api_meta.env_desc:
Update the inventory of unpublished global products if you have access to the Multi-Warehouse feature.
The inventory of published global products will not be affected by this update operation.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_body_param.name: global_skus
request_body_param.desc: The list of global SKUs that need to be updated.

request_body_param.name: ^id
request_body_param.desc: The global SKU ID in TikTok Shop.

request_body_param.name: ^^global_warehouse_id
request_body_param.desc: The ID of the global warehouse where the SKU is stored. Retrieve this value from [Get Global Product](6509e2b0bace3e02b7490c96) or [Get Global Seller Warehouse](650aa3f0defece02be6e5ffb).

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.
product status is invalid
Seller has no permission

Missing variations (sales attributes). When there are multiple SKUs in a product, each SKU must include variation (sales attribute) details that explain how it is different from other SKUs in the product.
The product ID does not exist.
You cannot edit the specified product(s) as it isn't listed in your account or shop.
The SKU inventory quantity for the warehouse must be within allowed limits.
No multiple warehouse permission
no permission of multi global warehouse
sku warehouse must equal
activity warehouse not allowed to be deleted
The specified inventory quantity is too low. It must be greater than the locked quantity (e.g. for committed orders, campaigns, creators) to ensure a non-negative available stock.
The product ID does not exist
the cover region of share warehouse can not cover the the product region

You still have stock reserved for campaigns in your Chinese warehouse(s), so you cannot add an overseas warehouse yet. If you have an overseas warehouse, you must use it to fulfill orders for your {{country}} shop.
Local fulfillment is required for {{country}} shop. You must have at least one {{country}} overseas warehouse for it.
The warehouse ' {{warehouse ID}} ' does not belong to this shop/seller.
The warehouse is disabled.
Removal, addition, and change of warehouses are not permitted. Please specify the original warehouses for the SKUs.
The SKU id not exist.
The seller is inactive.
The SKU list is empty. Either omit the list entirely, or provide all required details.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to manage seller's global product information, etc.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to manage your global product, including sku, stock, etc.

request_path_param.name: global_product_id
request_path_param.desc: The global product ID to be updated.
